author: Mobile to Go

changelog.release_notes:
* diorite support 
* prepared emery support 
* obscured area support 
* pebble V4.0 adpations 
* value scaling
* a lot of bugfixes/ improvements

* chalk enabled
* calories diagrams, daily reports
* estimated step distance in meter as well as feed
* a lot of optimzations, some bugfixes

description:
Pebble steps into the health market by providing a health monitoring. Under the cover – assuming the function is enabled in the pebble health app settings – algorithms detect steps, more vigorous movements resulting in a higher VMC value, sleep as well as restful sleep phases. Also active as well as retful calories consumption are tracked.

The new Watchface provides all this data to you put into configurable graphs. It’s up to you, what values over the time are interesting for you.

In particular the step count over the day is shown rated by a (funny) icon showing you e.g. a fat cat sitting in front of its TV, in case a low step count was measured. ;)

In addition the weather of your current location or a preconfigured fixed location is always shown. Also the time, the date in nearly any language is provided. Russian support was added lastly.

title: HealthWatch
